item.title: Travis-ci, C# and PCL
item.description: As any good library should do, I’m building my BCLExtensions project(extensions for the .net base class library) using PCL (Portable class library, Profile328 to be exact). It works great on my AppVeyor CI builds, which is a great .Net windows build server. I recently discovered Travis-CI has added beta C# support so I connected it up with my GitHub prooject, which is designed to eventually work with mono anyway, and gave it a go.
